summary: SummaryClinique Great Skin Everywhere Set: For Dry Combination Skin includes Clinique's dermatologist-developed 3-Step system in full + travel sizes.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry CombinationClinique's dermatologist-developed 3-Step skincare gives drier skin exactly what it needs to be great-looking skin.All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild cleanses gently.Clarifying Lotion helps clear dulling flakes for smoother, more radiant-looking skin with less noticeable pores.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ strengthens skinâ€™s moisture barrier so moisture stays in. Dermatologist tested.Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesFull Size All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild (6.7 oz)Jumbo Size Clarifying Lotion 2 Twice A Day Exfoliator with Pump (16.5 oz)Full Size Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ (4.2 oz)All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild (1.0 oz)Clarifying Lotion 2 Twice A Day Exfoliator (2.0 oz)Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ (1.0 oz)Item 2641057How To UseAll About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild: Use liquid facial soap twice a day, morning & night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+: Spread moisturizer all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: All About Clean Liquid Facial Soap Mild: Use liquid facial soap twice a day, morning & night. Lather between palms with lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Clarifying Lotion 2 Twice A Day Exfoliator: Use lotion toner twice a day, morning and night. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+: Spread moisturizer all over face/throat twice daily, or where needed.
